content: complete your look with the unique style of this cute knit purse stitched in bernat maker you ll reveal an impressive big stitch look as you master simple knit and purl techniques to create the lovely seed stitch fabric this knit knot purse is so entertaining to make you ll surely want to create a few in different colors to match everything in your closet it s a great gift option too materials bernat® maker™ 8 8 oz/250 g 317 yds/290 m jam 06008 1 ball or 225 yds/206 m measurement s body of bag excluding straps approximately 8 20 5 cm
